title: Son Speaks Out After Father Dies In Bali Amid Australian Consulate Failure | 10 News+
description: “They offered me support at his funeral... I needed your help a week ago.”  Jake Harvey, the son of a man who died in a Bali hospital after the Australian consulate failed to issue an emergency passport for a medical transfer, has spoken to 10 News+ about how his father was let down. title: How TikTok Exposed Coles And Helped Spark One Of Australia’s Biggest Consumer Court Cases | 10 News+
description: Content creator Paniora Nukunuku is known for calling out supermarket price gouging online, but he never thought his TikTok videos would help trigger one of the biggest consumer court battles in Australian history.   It was social media posts that helped tip off Australia's consumer watchdog, the ACCC, which today began landmark legal action against Coles in the Federal Court. title: DNA Recovered From Glove Found Near Nancy Guthrie’s Home | 10 News+
description: Investigators have recovered DNA from a glove found near the home of ‘Today’ host Savannah Guthrie’s mother.   The glove appears to match those worn by a masked person caught on doorbell camera outside Nancy Guthrie’s front door in Tucson the night she disappeared.   10 News+ spoke to forensic criminologist Dr Laura Pettler about the ongoing investigation into the alleged abduction. title: Thousands Without Power As Storms Rock New Zealand | 10 News
description: Tens of thousands have been left without power across New Zealand’s north island as wild storms bring destructive winds and heavy rain.  Major highways remain closed, with dozens of flights delayed or cancelled. title: Could Humanoid ‘Robo-Cops’ Be The Future Of Fighting Crime? | 10 News
description: Police forces around the world are turning to technology to fight crime, with predictions humanoid ‘robo-cops’ could be rolled out across western nations in 3-5 years.  China has already begun integrating robots into everyday policing, including traffic control in the city of Wuhu. title: 85-Year-Old Man Kidnapped, Tom Hanks In Sydney, New Zealand Storms | 10 News
description: Tonight on 10’s Late News - Tens of thousands have been left without power as storms rage across New Zealand’s north island, a total fire ban has been declared across much of Victoria for Tuesday, an 85-year-old man has been kidnapped in Sydney, an actor has claimed the Albanian government used her likeness to create an AI minister without her consent, a Hollywood legend has been spotted shopping for cricket gear in North Sydney, and the Liberal Party’s migration proposal has been leaked. title: Rhode Island Shooting Leaves At Least Two Dead At Pawtucket Ice Rink | 10 News
description: At least two people have been killed in a shooting at an indoor ice rink in Pawtucket, Rhode Island.  Police confirmed to local media that the suspected gunman is dead, and the attack happened during a boys’ hockey game between two local schools.  Witnesses report shots were fired from behind the stands. A local father has been praised for confronting the shooter, though it has been reported the shooter had a second weapon.  Four people have been taken to hospital.  More to come. title: Mick Gatto Speaks On Allegations Of Corruption And Profiteering In The CFMEU | 10 News
description: Notorious Melbourne identity Mick Gatto has hit back at claims he was a key figure in the scandal engulfing the construction industry, denying allegations he was a standover man and profited from widespread corruption.  State political reporter Jessica Maggio sat down with Gatto in this 10 News exclusive. title: Dominican Authorities Seize More Than 2,000 Kilograms Of Drugs | 10 News
description: Dominican authorities have arrested six people and seized more than 2,000 kilograms of suspected cocaine after intercepting a boat off the coast of Peravia province.  Officials said the boat was carrying 69 bales containing 2,049 packages of the substance wrapped in plastic bags and marked with different logos.  The operation involved several units including the US Southern Command conducting over 15 hours of surveillance before stopping a "Go Fast" vessel, which had no registration and arrived from South America. title: Hollywood Star Of ‘The Godfather’ & ‘Apocalypse Now’ Robert Duvall Dies Aged 95 | 10 News
description: Hollywood has lost one of the greatest character actors of all time following the death of Robert Duvall.  From his first role where he didn't even speak a line, to classics like The Godfather and Apocalypse Now, Robert Duvall stole scenes like a thief in the night.  He passed away yesterday aged 95. title: 34 Australian Brides And Children Of ISIS Fighters Make Second Attempt To Leave Syria | 10 News
description: Dozens of ISIS brides and their children, who are Australian citizens, will make a second attempt to leave Syria in the coming hours, after they were turned around by officials due to a “technical issue”.
